<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a>.wait(Lock, &#91;&amp;&#93; &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Stop || !WorkStack.empty(); &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Stop)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Task = std::move(WorkStack.back());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">      WorkStack.pop&#95;back();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Lock.unlock();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Task();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::atomic&lt;bool&gt; Stop&#123;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;std::function&lt;void()&gt;&gt; WorkStack;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::mutex <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a52d48084c5b60251870b6118e4670fee">Mutex</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::condition&#95;variable <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::promise&lt;void&gt; ThreadsCreated;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;std::thread&gt; Threads;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/lto/thinltocodegenerator-cpp/#ac93a706f78069d5f23b6084d9a1fc015">ThreadCount</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">Executor &#42;Executor::getDefaultExecutor() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifdef &#95;WIN32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The ManagedStatic enables the ThreadPoolExecutor to be stopped via</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// llvm&#95;shutdown() which allows a &quot;clean&quot; fast exit, e.g. via &#95;exit(). This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stops the thread pool and waits for any worker thread creation to complete</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but does not wait for the threads to finish. The wait for worker thread</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// creation to complete is important as it prevents intermittent crashes on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Windows due to a race condition between thread creation and process exit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The ThreadPoolExecutor will only be destroyed when the static unique&#95;ptr to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it is destroyed, i.e. in a normal full exit. The ThreadPoolExecutor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// destructor ensures it has been stopped and waits for worker threads to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// finish. The wait is important as it prevents intermittent crashes on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Windows when the process is doing a full exit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The Windows crashes appear to only occur with the MSVC static runtimes and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are more frequent with the debug static runtime.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This also prevents intermittent deadlocks on exit with the MinGW runtime.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/managedstatic">ManagedStatic</a>&lt;ThreadPoolExecutor, ThreadPoolExecutor::Creator,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       ThreadPoolExecutor::Deleter&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ManagedExec;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;ThreadPoolExecutor&gt; Exec(&amp;(&#42;ManagedExec));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Exec.get();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ManagedStatic is not desired on other platforms. When &#96;Exec&#96; is destroyed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by llvm&#95;shutdown(), worker threads will clean up and invoke TLS</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// destructors. This can lead to race conditions if other threads attempt to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// access TLS objects that have already been destroyed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ThreadPoolExecutor Exec(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/parallel/#a68f04a4e2c26fa6b9cd7517dced50729">strategy</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Exec;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace detail</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/parallel/#ac537a7c295510dfb54a3260e057c5c91">getThreadCount</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> detail::Executor::getDefaultExecutor()-&gt;getThreadCount();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Latch::sync() called by the dtor may cause one thread to block. If is a dead</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// lock if all threads in the default executor are blocked. To prevent the dead</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// lock, only allow the root TaskGroup to run tasks parallelly. In the scenario</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of nested parallel&#95;for&#95;each(), only the outermost one runs parallelly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/parallel/taskgroup/#a383436e232e602a67d0f17c76a97057e"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/parallel/taskgroup/#a383436e232e602a67d0f17c76a97057e">TaskGroup::TaskGroup</a>()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if LLVM&#95;ENABLE&#95;THREADS</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    : Parallel((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/parallel/#a68f04a4e2c26fa6b9cd7517dced50729">parallel::strategy</a>.ThreadsRequested != 1) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">               (threadIndex == UINT&#95;MAX)) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    : Parallel(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/parallel/taskgroup/#a1fcdb4a971f8751ed7e3ea6150fdd0fb"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/parallel/taskgroup/#a1fcdb4a971f8751ed7e3ea6150fdd0fb">TaskGroup::~TaskGroup</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We must ensure that all the workloads have finished before decrementing the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instances count.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  L.sync();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aca37fe9da8af401451f8bb3c8241f83d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aca37fe9da8af401451f8bb3c8241f83d">llvm::parallelFor</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Begin, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> End,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">llvm::function&#95;ref</a>&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)&gt; Fn) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if LLVM&#95;ENABLE&#95;THREADS</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/parallel/#a68f04a4e2c26fa6b9cd7517dced50729">parallel::strategy</a>.ThreadsRequested != 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumItems = End - Begin;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Limit the number of tasks to MaxTasksPerGroup to limit job scheduling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// overhead on large inputs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TaskSize = NumItems / parallel::detail::MaxTasksPerGroup;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TaskSize == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TaskSize = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/parallel/taskgroup">parallel::TaskGroup</a> TG;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (; Begin + TaskSize &lt; End; Begin += TaskSize) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/parallel/taskgroup/#a5f936d7e589b0615fccac0a4c0cb8d97">spawn</a>(&#91;=, &amp;Fn&#93; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = Begin, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = Begin + TaskSize; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/parallel/taskgroup/#a5f936d7e589b0615fccac0a4c0cb8d97">spawn</a>(&#91;=, &amp;Fn&#93; &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"></CodeLine>
